resources.string: More missions will come soon.\n\nPlease wait for a moment.
How\'s the game? :)\n\nPlease rate this game.
This will replace the existing unit with a cost.\n\nDo you want to proceed it?
There\'s no unit.\nPress buttons below to recruit them.
It adds an upkeep and can\'t cancel it after upgrades.\nWill you proceed it?
Not enough gold for this upgrade!\nPlease try it later.
Select the button which you want to upgrade.
Select the class which you want to upgrade.

You are the chief of a small town.

 At last winter, you lost many friends. But it's time to stop mourning and need to go forward.

 Keep your town managed and boost the population again.
Hint: You can recruit worker to take more land.
Hint: This mission doesn\'t require any market or fortress.
Hint: Make it fast forward if you are bored.
Bandits are approaching to the town. You need to take care before villagers are worried.\n\n This is a good change to prove your tactical skills.
Hint: You can attack the retreating enemy.
Hint: You can recruit more squads.
Hint: Make it fast forward if you are bored.

Great!
Our soldiers defeated the bandits near the town. But they will come again. We need to gather as much gold as possible.

 It will help to gather gold if there is a big market near the town.
Hint: Markets are grown faster on badlands.
Hint: You can build facilities up to total Lv5 in a land.
Hint: You can increase the income by taking lands.
Hint: Worker boost the development speed of a land.
Hint: You need to adjust the development policy to get Lv4 facility.
Hint: Make it fast forward if you are bored.
As you anticipated, a group of bandits are gathered in the north forest. You have a lump of gold from the market.\n\n Show your money to bandits!!!
Hint: You have enough money. Recruit many squads.
Hint: If you are afford to upkeep, upgrade your units.
Hint: You can increase the income by taking lands.
Hint: Utilize the supporting squads during battle.
Hint: If they have more lands, they will make more squads.
Hint: Make it fast forward if you are bored.
Market is now very flourished and many villagers look up to you. There are still bunch of bandits around but shouldn\'t give us a big headache. \n\nMake your town even bigger!
Have each Lv5 town and Lv5 market
Hint: You have enough money. Recruit workers.
Hint: Workers will be helpful to make Lv5 facility.
Hint: Decide carefully where you build Lv5 facility.
Hint: Town boost many things of the neighbor lands.
Hint: Keep your workers onto land which you build Lv5 facility.
Hint: Make it fast forward if you are bored.

As the town is getting bigger and bigger, more bandits are approaching. This time, bandits are much powerful than before. You just recall there is a shrine which many healers stop by.\n\n Keep your town from bandits.
Hint: Visit the shrine before bandits comes if possible.
Hint: You need to bring enough force to the shrine.
Hint: You can build a fortress in a hill for defense.
Hint: Enemy will regain power if they earn times to rest.
Hint: Workers can continue working behind the scene.
Hint: If you take enemy headquarter, they will stop recruiting new squad.
Healers decide to help you from now on.
You bow to healers to ask their aids..\n\nAfter some silence, they follows you..
You were managed to keep your town from bandits. But before taking a breath, you heard a horn sound from the south river.\n\n Chief, It\'s vikings!!!
Hint: Mission will be accomplished if you keep alive for the certain time.
Hint: If you don\'t need workers, replace them into other units.
Hint: You can build fortresses for defense.
Hint: Viking can cross the river.
Hint: Healers are boring but make you sustained for a long time.
Hint: Bandit\'s headquarter can be taken...
Hint: Hold a little more and you win!!!

Viking burned everything. You and survivors retreated to the Shrine of healing. Bandits still left and plunder our lands.\n\n There is the Shrine of Wind at the north from here. You should find a clue from there.
Hint: You don\t have many choices. Run to north!
Hint: Take shrine as fast as you can.
Hint: Horseman is fast but very weak to ranged attacks.
Hint: Horseman and healers are good combination on battle.
Hint: Horseman can outrun your enemy.
God of Wind accept your prayer.
You have prayed to the shrine..\n\nAfter sun sets, you suddenly heard an animal sound from somewhere..
Our horseman completely defeat bandit\'s front squads. You should push them now.\n\n And you need to rebuild everything you lost.
Hint: You should defeat enemy and gather populations.
Hint: Horseman is very weak to the ranged attack.
Hint: Horseman can be very strong if healers support them.
Hint: Enemy can regain units quickly if you give them a time to rest.
Hint: You may not have time to gather 500 population.
Hint: Remove fortress if you don\'t need them.
Hint: Recruit more workers if you are winning on battle.

Chief, we finally regain the town completely. Bandits are all scattered and we need to sweep them for revenge. \n\nAdditionally a scout reported that there is a shrine in north west forest. It might be helpful to visit there.
Defeat bandits / Take Shrine of Love
Hint: Bandits are scattered but be careful.
Hint: Bandits are still remained powerful. Need some squads.
Hint: You don\'t need to be hurry about a shrine.
Hint: Upgrade will help you win battles.
Hint: If you take enemy\'s headquarter, remained enemy will be on berserk.
Hint: Too many upgrade is the short-cut to the bankruptcy.
Town is getting rich again. There are foods and golds everywhere and big festivals are held in town. We can hear even the firework sound from somewhere.\n\n Wait.. Who shot the fireworks?
Hint: Vikings are coming from the south with a firework sound.
Hint: Vikings bring new weapons. Beware!
Hint: You should prepare as the enemies are very strong.
Hint: You shouldn\'t allow supports to enemy\'s cannon.
Hint: Battle against Vikings near the river is not good.
Hint: Too many upgrades lead to the bankruptcy.
Hint: Viking\s headquarter lies across the river.

Cannon which Vikings bring is very devastating weapon. Vikings approached to the front gate of town. An artisan told you. \"I need 20,000 golds for copying their weapon\"\n\n That means if you have 20,000 golds, you can shoot them as they did to you.
Hint: There is a new shrine at the nort of town.
Hint: Cannon is very powerful weapon if you can use it properly.
Hint: You should do battle with supporting squads.
Hint: Cannon is very very slow.
Hint: Don\'t fight with Vikings near the river.
Hint: Too many upgrades lead to the bankruptcy.
Hint: Vikings\' headquarter is across the river.
God of Gold accepts your prayer.
You have prayed to the shrine..\n\nYour pulse is fluttering and your pants are getting heavier!!
Finally an artisan made a cannon.\nShow your cannon to them!

You showed your hot pepper cannon ball to Vikings. Still there are full of enemies around. Rebels are coming from the east and Bandits and Vikings coming from the west. \n\nYou need a miracle. Pray on every shrines!
Hint: Miracle shall happen when all shrines are taken.
Hint: You shouldn\'t fight without supporting.
Hint: Your units sometimes need a rest.
Hint: You can flank enemies\' headquarters.
Hint: Expand your border using workers.
Hint: There are multiple ways to finish this mission.
God of Heal accepts your prayer.
Mysterious warriors arise near Shrine of Healing...\n\nThey will help you!!
God of Wind accepts your prayer.
Mysterious warriors arise near Shrine of Wind...\n\nThey will help you!!
God of Gold accepts your prayer.
Mysterious warriors arise near Shrine of Gold...\n\nThey will help you!!
God of Love accepts your prayer.
Mysterious warriors arise near Shrine of Love...\n\nThey will help you!!
It\'s a free game.\n\n Fight your enemy on same conditions. All units and upgrades are unlocked.
You took Shrine of Wind. Moving speed is increased.
You took Shrine of Healing. Resting is more efficient.
You took Shrine of Love. Population is increased.
You took Shrine of Gold. Incomd is increased.
Do you want to proceed Tutorial?

Chief!

I'm your adviser. Now I will teach you how to manage squads.


Touch anywhere.
∙ You already have two squads.\n\n∙ Their location is showing as icon at the middle of tiles.
∙ Each squad can have at most 3 units.\n\n∙ Units are recruiting. Please wait for a while...
∙ Recruiting is done.\n\n∙ Units are represented as a small circle on map. Touch anywhere.
∙ You can check the info of squad by pressing the below info button. \n\n∙ As bonus effects said, various tils and facility can affect to squads.
∙ Not let\'s move the squad.\n\n∙ You can move the squad by dragging the squad icon.

∙ Let me move the squad this time.

∙ Now the squad is moving to the red area. 

Please wait for a moment..
∙ Now moving the squad is finished.\n\n∙ As the squad moves to the new place, you can see some of fog areas are revealed.
∙ You can take the land by locating the squad to other faction\'s land.\n\nPlease wait for a moment..
∙ Now you take new land.\n\n∙ Maybe a bandit is around the land. Let me move the squad again.
∙ Finally you found a bandit.\n\n∙ A bandit is on the headquarter.
∙ If you choose the bandit squad, you can see their information.\n\n∙ Bandit have a armor bonus from the headquarter.
∙ Now it\'s time to remove a bandit.\n\n∙ You can start a battle by dragging your squad to the enemy.
∙ Let me move the squad this time.\n\n∙ Let\'s see what happened during battle..
∙ Our squad is fighting well but need a help.\n\n∙ Let\'s move another squad to support your squad.

∙ If you move your squad into the next tile of battle, it will start supporting the battle.

∙ Let me move this time.

Please wait for a moment..
∙ Now our squad starts to support the battle.\n\n∙ Supporting is the key factor to make your battle win. Use it wisely.
∙ FYI, not all units can support others.\n\n∙ Choose wisely who to fight and who to support.

Chief!
 Now I will finish the tutorial now.

∙ Tip: Crash the bandit squad now!

Chief!

I'm your adviser. Now I will teach you how to manage the town.


Touch anywhere.
∙ This number shows the amount of gold in town.\n\n∙ Gold can be used for recruiting and upgrades. The market increases the income.
∙ This number shows the usable population.\n\n∙ Population can be used for recruiting and the farm increases it.
∙ The face shows the happiness of villager.\n\n∙ Happiness affects to the income.
∙ Buttons control the speed of game.\n\n∙ You can pause or control speed any time.
∙ You can check the mission goal by using this button.\n
∙ You can see the status of town by pressing the home button.\n\n∙ You can upgrade the unit also.
∙ It\'s the dialog poping up when the home button is pressed.\n\n∙ You can see the stats of town.
∙ You can upgrade by pressing the upgrade button.
∙ This is the upgrade dialog. You can select the button to choose the unit class which you want to upgrade.\n\n∙ Upgrade will cost upkeep and can not cancel after upgrading it.
∙ You can choose tile to do further actions.
∙ You can see the information of your squad or land by pressing the information button.
∙ It\'s the dialog which shows the information of land.\n\n∙ You can check the income or population of land here.
∙ Those buttons can control the development policy of facilities.\n\n∙ Total level sum of facilities are limit to 5 in a land.
∙ Farm increases the population.\n\n∙ Farm grows quickly at the grass and the badlands while slowly at the forest and the hill.
∙ Market increases the income.\n\n∙ Market grows quickly at the grass and the forest while slowly at the hills.
∙ Town increase the efficiency of nearby farms and markets.\n\n∙ Town grows quickly at the badlands and the hills while slowly at the forest.
∙ Fortress increase the defense of land but decrease the happiness of nearby lands.\n\n∙ Fortress grows quickly at the forest and the hills while slowly at the grass and the badlands.
∙ You can recruit new squad by pressing the recruiting button.\n\n∙ This button only shows up when it\'s available.
∙ If you press the unit button, you can add units to your squad.\n\n∙ If you don\'t add any units, squad will be removed.
∙ You can add at most 3 units to a squad.
∙ It\'s the dialog when you pressed the unit button.\n\n∙ You can choose the unit class by pressing the below buttons.

Chief!
Tutorial for management is now finished.

∙ Tip: If you focus on farm development, you can easily finish the mission.
It accelerates the development of land and increase the income also. But there\'s no fighting skills and slow.
It\'s a well balanced melee soldier. It\'s weak to the horseman.
It\'s possible to do the ranged attack and support. But it\'s useless if enemy is too close to them.
It\'s very fast and powerful. But it is vulnerable to the ranged attack.
It can heal units in battle. But it doesn\'t have fighting skills.
It has very powerful ranged attack and splash damage. But it\'s useless if enemy is too close to them.
It can attack melee and heal at the same time. It\'s powerful but expensive.
